metadata.description: cc10x v2.1 - Focused orchestrator: Does what you ask, delivers results fast

plugins.name: cc10x
plugins.description: cc10x v2.1: Focused orchestrator that does what you ask without losing control. 11 specialized agents, 20 domain skills. THE FOCUS RULE: Only activates workflows user requested (no forced orchestration). Quick mode default (delivers fast), systematic mode optional (if explicitly requested). Review (5-star) finds issues. Build delivers working code. Fix uses LOG FIRST. User controls flow. PostToolUse hook enforces <500 lines. Honest: costs more for systematic, use when quality matters.
